snippet: The men who created Carbone and other Italian-American restaurants have dropped plans to open the Lobster Club. Replacing it will be ZZ’s Clam Bar.
abstract: The men who created Carbone and other Italian-American restaurants have dropped plans to open the Lobster Club. Replacing it will be ZZ’s Clam Bar.

headline.main: Torrisi Group Switches From Sandwiches to Clams
